name: VR Deadly Dino Safari: Jungle Predator Hunting
name_original: VR Deadly Dino Safari: Jungle Predator Hunting
description:
Commander! There is a serous situation at the dinosaur safari island and these extreme size monsters predators are on the loose and starts killing the humans and other innocent animals. You, as an ex-military sniper and commando officer, have been called for a rescue missions and eliminate and gun down these threatening deadly carnivores in an ultimate battle between man and wild beats in VR Deadly Dino Safari: Jungle Predator Hunting.
Hunt these predators beasts before they hunt you. These are not normal wild animals to hunt down. These are the largest living animals on this planet earth the man has ever seen which also gain and increase his intelligence day by day.
In VR Deadly Dino Safari: Jungle Predator Hunting you have to plan your hunt on the extreme difficult and unfriendly forest conditions, with advance weapons, Ak-47, cold commando, Sniper Rifles, shooting & Sniper Skills to find and kill these intelligent monster hunter on this dinosaur safari park island. You will face the complete dinosaur spices like Spinosaurus, Pteranodon, Apatosaurus, Velociraptor, Triceratops,Stegosaurus and many other extreme ones which are now out of control and has to stopped before they can reach the normal city population.
This action packed game is on VR and compatible with all phones with gyroscope support to enjoy the excitement and fun with you family and friends. So download the VR Deadly Dino Safari: Jungle Predator Hunting and unleash the non stop action and thrill!
Unique Game Features:
- Smooth and easy VR controls
- Advance Assault and Sniper Weapons
- High Definition Virtual Reality Graphics
- Real Jungle Jurassic Environments
- Addictive game-play
- Action packed Dino hunting missions
